channel.title: CristinaMihailescu on UN-aligned
channel.description: Recent content in CristinaMihailescu on UN-aligned

item.title: Today's London through the eyes of an old Communist hag
item.author: CristinaMihailescu
item.description: London has always been my dream. Ever since my first English lesson, back in 1974, I have imagined myself wandering along its famous streets, visiting its exquisite monuments, but the city was unlike anything I imagined it to be.

item.title: Romania Always Welcomes Ukrainian Refugees: Support and Opportunities Await
item.author: CristinaMihailescu
item.description: Many people have shared their homes with total strangers, people with whom they can only communicate in sign language. But what need is there for a common language when humanity is all that matters?
